results.question: what is the history of AI
results.answer: The history of AI began in 1956 during the Dartmouth workshop, which marked the emergence of AI as a formal discipline. Initially, there was significant optimism about the potential of AI. However, during the 1970s, the field faced the "AI winter," a period of reduced funding and interest. In the 1980s, interest in AI was revived through expert systems, although this too was followed by another slowdown. A major renaissance in AI began around 2012 with advancements in deep learning, notably through the ImageNet challenge. The introduction of transformers in 2017 further advanced the field, leading to the development of large language models such as ChatGPT in 2022.
retrieved_contexts: Artificial intelligence (AI) emerged as a discipline in 1956 at the Dartmouth workshop. Early optimism gave way to funding cuts in the 1970s 'AI winter'. Expert systems in the 1980s revived interest before another slowdown. The deep learning renaissance began around 2012 with ImageNet. Transformers in 2017 led to large language models like ChatGPT (2022).
results.reference: AI began as a field in 1956 at the Dartmouth workshop. Early optimism led to an AI winter in the 1970s. Expert systems revived interest in the 1980s. Deep learning advances around 2012 (ImageNet) sparked a resurgence. Transformers (2017) enabled large language models such as ChatGPT (2022).

results.question: how can I reset my password on KI Campus?
results.answer: To reset your password on KI Campus, you can typically use the "Passwort vergessen" (Forgot Password) option on the login page.
retrieved_contexts: Auf KI Campus finden Lernende unter 'Meine Kurse' ihre aktiv belegten Lehrangebote. Ein Passwort lässt sich in der Regel über 'Passwort vergessen' auf der Login-Seite zurücksetzen.

results.question: how can I see my course plan on KI Campus?
results.answer: You can see your course plan on KI Campus by navigating to 'Meine Kurse' (My Courses), where you will find your actively enrolled courses.
